title: Amazon shoppers have officially crowned this vitamin C serum as the best
text:
Touted as must-have skincare ingredient by dermatologists, vitamin C is hailed for its skincare benefits. These include its ability to brighten your complexion and keeping your skin looking younger for longer.

When added to your routine on the regular it works wonders and has a number of proven benefits; it boosts collagen production, reduces brown spots caused by sun exposure, and is also an antioxidant. So while vitamin C doesn't protect like an SPF, it can block damage caused by free radicals created by pollution.

Which makes it unsurprising that Viola Skin's Vitamin C Serum is the number one best-seller in beauty and face serums on Amazon.

Viola Skin's Vitamin C Serum boosts collagen production, reduces brown spots caused by sun exposure, and is also an antioxidant

The serum, which costs just £14.96, boasts an impressive average rating of 4.2 out of 5 stars and has racked up more than 4,500 reviews.

You could even argue that the vitamin C serum from lesser-known brand Viola has achieved cult status in the skin care world.

According to one shopper, they said goodbye to dark spots after just a few days of use: 'I have used this for a week now and the brown mark over my eye is definitely going lighter, so I am delighted as you can imagine.'

Another raved: 'Incredible and has given me an amazing skin, everyone says I look 10 years younger than I am.'

A third customer noted: 'Seriously, when I was reading the reviews I thought people were making [it] up. But now I'm on my second one. I just can't now leave without it anymore – I wear it every morning.'

Impressed customers on Amazon have shared before and after pictures having used Viola Skin's Vitamin C Serum for just one week

Several other customer reviews mention how they've repurchased the serum, because it's just that good: 'I absolutely love this product and have just purchased my third bottle.'

Viola Skin's Vitamin C Serum has a gel-like consistency and is completely clear, absorbing deeply into the skin, and should be applied in the morning before sunscreen.

The concentrated serum also contains hyaluronic acid to plump and smooth and has a lengthy free-from list including alcohol, parabens, sulphate and gluten.
